General.Name: Anhui Shiny Electronic Technology Company Limited
General.Description: Anhui Shiny Electronic Technology Company Limited engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of structural components and related precision molds for consumer electronics products in China. The company offers stamping parts, metal structural parts, molds, hardware accessories, injection molding parts, spraying, and plastic products. Its products are primarily used in notebook computers. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Luan, China.
General.Address: Intersection of Jingui Road and Tangwang, Luan, China, 231323

AddressData.Street: Intersection of Jingui Road and Tangwang
